rsl Namespace Reference


Interpolations

template<typename T> T linear (const T &a, const T &b, const T &x)
 Do a linear interpolation.

miColor linear (const miColor &a, const miColor &b, const miColor &x)
 Do a linear interpolation of colors.

miVector linear (const miVector &a, const miVector &b, const miVector &x)
 Do a linear interpolation of vectors.

template<typename T> T step (const T &a, const T &b)
 Do a step (binary) interpolatio.

template<typename T> T smoothstep (const T &a, const T &b, const T &x)
 Do a smoothstep interpolation.

template<typename T> T silkysmoothstep (const T &a, const T &b, const T &x)
 Do an even smoother smoothstep interpolation.

template<typename T> T pulse (const T &a, const T &b, const T &x)
 Do a pulse interpolation.

template<typename T> T smoothpulse (const T &a, const T &b, const T &x)
 Do a smoothpulse interpolation.

template<typename T> T smoothpulse (const T &a, const T &b, const T &fuzz, const T &x)
 Do a smoothpulse interpolation with controlled fuzziness.

template<typename T> T silkysmoothpulse (const T &a, const T &b, const T &fuzz, const T &x)
 Do an even smoother smoothpulse interpolation with controlled fuzziness.


mix

 Mix two elements of identical type together, based on x=[0,1].

Detailed Description

A file to add most RSL constructs.
